   20: 
   21: -module(mnesia_external_backend_test).
   22: 
   23: -export([init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2,
   24:          init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2,
   25:          suite/0, all/0, groups/0]).
   26: 
   27: -export([
   28:     conversion_from_external_to_disc_copies_should_not_result_in_data_loss_after_node_restart/1,
   29:     backup_and_restore_should_work_with_external_backend/1,
   30:     schema_creation_should_work_when_external_tables_exist/1,
   31:     schema_merge_of_schema_table_should_work_with_external_backend/1,
   32:     schema_merge_of_other_table_in_same_transaction_as_schema_table_should_work_with_external_backend/1
   33: ]).
   34: 
   35: -include("mnesia_test_lib.hrl").
   36: 
   37: -record(some_rec, {some_id :: atom(), some_int :: number(), some_string :: string()}).
   38: 
   39: -define(init(N, Config),
   40:         mnesia_test_lib:prepare_test_case([{init_test_case, [mnesia]},
   41:                                            delete_schema,
   42:                                            start_ext_test_server,
   43:                                            {reload_appls, [mnesia]}],
   44:                                           N, Config, ?FILE, ?LINE)).
   45: 
   46: all() -> [
   47:     conversion_from_external_to_disc_copies_should_not_result_in_data_loss_after_node_restart,
   48:     backup_and_restore_should_work_with_external_backend,
   49:     schema_creation_should_work_when_external_tables_exist,
   50:     schema_merge_of_schema_table_should_work_with_external_backend,
   51:     schema_merge_of_other_table_in_same_transaction_as_schema_table_should_work_with_external_backend
   52: ].
   53: 
   54: groups() ->
   55:     [].
   56: 
   57: init_per_testcase(Func, Conf) ->
   58:     file:delete("bup0.BUP"),
   59:     file:delete("bup1.BUP"),
   60:     file:delete("bup2.BUP"),
   61:     mnesia_test_lib:init_per_testcase(Func, Conf).
   62: 
   63: end_per_testcase(Func, Conf) ->
   64:     mnesia_test_lib:end_per_testcase(Func, Conf).
   65: 
   66: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   67:     Config.
   68: 
   69: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   70:     Config.
   71: 
   72: suite() -> [{ct_hooks,[{ts_install_cth,[{nodenames,1}]}]}].
   73: 
   74: conversion_from_external_to_disc_copies_should_not_result_in_data_loss_after_node_restart(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   75:     Data = [
   76:         #some_rec{some_id = a, some_int = 1, some_string = "something" },
   77:         #some_rec{some_id = b, some_int = 2, some_string = "anything"  },
   78:         #some_rec{some_id = c, some_int = 3, some_string = "everything"},
   79:         #some_rec{some_id = d, some_int = 4, some_string = "nothing"   }
   80:     ],
   81: 
   82:     [Node] = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
   83:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(table, [
   84:         {type, ordered_set},
   85:         {record_name, some_rec},
   86:         {attributes, record_info(fields, some_rec)},
   87:         {disc_copies, [Node]}
   88:     ])),
   89: 
   90:     ?match(ok, mnesia:activity(transaction, fun() ->
   91:         lists:foreach(fun(Elem) -> mnesia:write(table, Elem, write) end, Data)
   92:     end)),
   93: 
   94:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(table, Node, ext_ram_copies)),
   95:     ?match(Data, mnesia:activity(transaction, fun() ->
   96:         mnesia:match_object(table, #some_rec{_ = '_'}, read) end
   97:     )),
   98: 
   99:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(table, Node, disc_copies)),
  100:     ?match(Data, mnesia:activity(transaction, fun() ->
  101:         mnesia:match_object(table, #some_rec{_ = '_'}, read) end
  102:     )),
  103: 
  104:     ?match(stopped, mnesia:stop()),
  105:     ?match(ok, mnesia:start()),
  106:     ?match(ok, mnesia:wait_for_tables([schema, table], 10000)),
  107: 
  108:     ?match(Data, mnesia:activity(transaction, fun() ->
  109:         mnesia:match_object(table, #some_rec{_ = '_'}, read) end
  110:     )),
  111: 
  112:     ?verify_mnesia([Node], []).
  113: 
  114: backup_and_restore_should_work_with_external_backend(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  115:     Data1 = [
  116:         #some_rec{some_id = a, some_int = 1, some_string = "1"},
  117:         #some_rec{some_id = b, some_int = 2, some_string = "2"},
  118:         #some_rec{some_id = c, some_int = 3, some_string = "3"}
  119:     ],
  120:     Data2 = [
  121:         #some_rec{some_id = d, some_int = 4, some_string = "4"},
  122:         #some_rec{some_id = e, some_int = 5, some_string = "5"},
  123:         #some_rec{some_id = f, some_int = 6, some_string = "6"}
  124:     ],
  125: 
  126:     [Node] = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
  127:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(table, [
  128:         {type, set},
  129:         {record_name, some_rec},
  130:         {attributes, record_info(fields, some_rec)},
  131:         {ext_disc_only_copies, [Node]}
  132:     ])),
  133: 
  134:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:add_table_index(table, #some_rec.some_int)),
  135:     ?match([], mnesia:dirty_match_object(table, #some_rec{_ = '_'})),
  136:     ?match(ok, mnesia:backup("bup0.BUP")),
  137: 
  138:     ?match(ok, mnesia:activity(transaction, fun() ->
  139:         lists:foreach(fun(Elem) -> mnesia:write(table, Elem, write) end, Data1)
  140:     end)),
  141:     ?match(ok, mnesia:backup("bup1.BUP")),
  142: 
  143:     ?match(ok, mnesia:activity(transaction, fun() ->
  144:         lists:foreach(fun(Elem) -> mnesia:write(table, Elem, write) end, Data2)
  145:     end)),
  146:     ?match(ok, mnesia:backup("bup2.BUP")),
  147: 
  148:     ?match(ok, load_backup("bup0.BUP")),
  149:     ?match([], mnesia:dirty_match_object(table, #some_rec{_ = '_'})),
  150:     ?match([], mnesia:dirty_index_read(table, 2, #some_rec.some_int)),
  151: 
  152:     ?match(ok, load_backup("bup1.BUP")),
  153:     Expected1 = sets:from_list(Data1),
  154:     ?match(Expected1, sets:from_list(mnesia:dirty_match_object(table, #some_rec{_ = '_'}))),
  155:     ?match([#some_rec{some_id = b, some_int = 2, some_string = "2"}], mnesia:dirty_index_read(table, 2, #some_rec.some_int)),
  156: 
  157:     ?match(ok, load_backup("bup2.BUP")),
  158:     Expected2 = sets:from_list(lists:append(Data1, Data2)),
  159:     ?match(Expected2, sets:from_list(mnesia:dirty_match_object(table, #some_rec{_ = '_'}))),
  160:     ?match([#some_rec{some_id = b, some_int = 2, some_string = "2"}], mnesia:dirty_index_read(table, 2, #some_rec.some_int)),
  161:     ?match([#some_rec{some_id = e, some_int = 5, some_string = "5"}], mnesia:dirty_index_read(table, 5, #some_rec.some_int)),
  162: 
  163:     ?verify_mnesia([Node], []).
  164: 
  165: schema_creation_should_work_when_external_tables_exist(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  166:     [Node] = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
  167:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(table, [
  168:         {type, set},
  169:         {record_name, some_rec},
  170:         {attributes, record_info(fields, some_rec)},
  171:         {ext_disc_only_copies, [Node]}
  172:     ])),
  173:     
  174:     ?match(stopped, mnesia:stop()),
  175:     ?match(ok, mnesia:delete_schema([Node])),
  176: 
  177:     Ext = proplists:get_value(default_properties, Config, ?BACKEND),
  178:     ?match(ok, mnesia:create_schema([Node], Ext)).
  179: 
  180: schema_merge_of_schema_table_should_work_with_external_backend(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  181:     [N1, N2] = ?init(2, Config),
  182:     Ext = proplists:get_value(default_properties, Config, ?BACKEND),
  183:     ?match(ok, mnesia:create_schema([N1], Ext)),
  184:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([N1])),
  185: 
  186:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:add_table_copy(schema, N2, ram_copies)),
  187: 
  188:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, start, [[{schema_location, ram}, {extra_db_nodes, [N1]}]])),
  189: 
  190:     ?match({[true, true], []}, rpc:multicall([N1, N2], ext_test, is_backend_initialized, [])).
  191: 
  192: schema_merge_of_other_table_in_same_transaction_as_schema_table_should_work_with_external_backend(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  193:     [N1, N2] = ?init(2, Config),
  194:     Ext = proplists:get_value(default_properties, Config, ?BACKEND),
  195:     ?match(ok, mnesia:create_schema([N1], Ext)),
  196:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([N1])),
  197: 
  198:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:create_table(table, [
  199:         {type, set},
  200:         {record_name, some_rec},
  201:         {attributes, record_info(fields, some_rec)},
  202:         {ext_disc_only_copies, [N1]}
  203:     ])),
  204: 
  205:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:add_table_copy(schema, N2, ram_copies)),
  206: 
  207:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, start, [[{schema_location, ram}, {extra_db_nodes, [N1]}]])),
  208: 
  209:     ?match({[true, true], []}, rpc:multicall([N1, N2], ext_test, is_backend_initialized, [])).
  210: 
  211: load_backup(BUP) ->
  212:     ?match(ok, mnesia:install_fallback(BUP)),
  213:     ?match(stopped, mnesia:stop()),
  214:     timer:sleep(3000),
  215:     ?match(ok, mnesia:start()),
  216:     ?match(ok, mnesia:wait_for_tables([schema, table], 5000)),
  217:     ok.
